name: Infinite Space (itch) (Qian33)
description:
You are the pilot of the spaceship, it is very hard to control it in the universe, so be careful don't drive too fast. There are aliens in the scene, try to drive your spaceship toward them to destroy them. You can also pick up coins and chargers in the scene, the chargers can boost your speed, but be careful, being too fast can make your ship going out of control. (PS: Make good use of the clouds, they can drag your speed down)

WASD to move

ESC to quit

(PPS: The position of UI may be off, won't affect the game 0:
